points_systems.name: None
points_systems.description: No points will be awarded.  The league administrator will assign points at a later date.

points_systems.name: ARCA
points_systems.description: 1st through 43rd earn points. Pole Position awards 1 point. Leading a Lap awards 1 point. Leading the Most Laps awards 1 point.

points_systems.name: European Endurance
points_systems.description: 1st through 10th earn decreasing amounts of points. All other drivers earn 1 point.

points_systems.name: Grand Prix
points_systems.description: Positions 1 through 10 awarded 25, 18, 15, 12, 10, 8, 6, 4, 2, and 1 points.  Remaining positions awarded 0 points.

points_systems.name: IMSA
points_systems.description: 1st through 30th earn points.\n\nQualifying is scored at 1/10 the points value of the Race.

points_systems.name: Modern Grand Prix
points_systems.description: 1st through 10th earn points. Fastest Lap in the Race awards an extra point.

points_systems.name: Off Road Trucks
points_systems.description: 1st through 5th earn points in Qualifying. 1st through 26th earn points in the Race.

points_systems.name: Oval
points_systems.description: 43 points for 1st.  Each subsequent position gets one less point, all the way own to 43rd with 1 point.  44th and onward get 0 points.

points_systems.name: Rallycross
points_systems.description: 1st through 6th earn points in Qualifying. 1st through 8th earn points in the Heats. 1st through 10th earn points in the Feature.

points_systems.name: Two Race Weekend
points_systems.description: 1st through 10th score points in both the Sprint and Feature. Pole Position awards 4 points. Fastest Lap in each race awards 2 points.

points_systems.name: US Open Wheel
points_systems.description: 1st through 33rd earn points. Pole Position awards 1 point. Leading a Lap awards 1 point. Leading the Most Laps awards 2 points.

points_systems.name: USAC
points_systems.description: 70 points for 1st, decreasing by 3 for top 10, decreasing by 2 for 11th through 20th.  Balance of field 23 each.

points_systems.name: World of Outlaws
points_systems.description: All drivers receive points for entry. All drivers in the Feature earn more points.
